div.p: MF gathered the data, coded the model in STATA and wrote the draft of the paper. SB administered the workshops with experts and stakeholders, harmonized part of the dataset and reviewed the literature. WR estimated the empirical orthogonal functions and carried out all the GIS analysis. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
